SEARCH
Package server

Klasse Game

java.lang.Object
server.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents the game logic and manages relationships between players and game attributes. It handles game mechanics such as turn management, player actions and game state transitions.

  • Methodendetails

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Initializes game attributes with default values. This method is called when new game is created.

    • getInstance

      public static Game getInstance(Server server, ArrayList<ServerThread> activePlayers)
      Creates unique Game instance.

    • getSelectableList

      public ArrayList<ServerThread> getSelectableList()
      Gibt zurück:
      List of players, who can be selected by a card effect.

    • checkMoveOn

      public void checkMoveOn(ServerThread player)
      Checks if a player can pass the turn to the next player. If not - the round ended.
      Parameter:
      player - Sends a request to pass the turn to the next player.

    • checkSelectable

      public void checkSelectable(ServerThread player)
      Updates the list of active players, who can be selected during the execution of a card effect.
      Parameter:
      player - Sends request for an update

    • printSelectable

      public String printSelectable()
      Builds a String out of the names of players, who can be selected during the execution of a card effect and returns it.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(ServerThread player)
      Binds the String received as a game command by the ServerThread to a card from the player hand.
      Parameter:
      player - passes the game command to the Game instance.

    • playSelection

      public boolean playSelection(ServerThread player)
      This method contains the implementation of card effects affecting another player.
      Parameter:
      player - is the ServerThread passing the selected player.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the card effect was successfully executed.

    • knockOutOfRound

      public void knockOutOfRound(ServerThread player)
      Removes ServerThread from the round.
      Parameter:
      player - is removed from the round.

    • startRound

      public void startRound()
      Initialize some players' and game attributes with default values. Executes the initial drawing of cards for players at the start of the game. Passes the turn to the first player.
